EVTDESC_RoI_10011: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName], [From.Reincarnation.GetTitledFirstName] reborn, is acting more like [From.GetPossPronoun] previous incarnation every day! [From.GetFirstName] is definitely expressing another of [From.Reincarnation.GetFirstName]'s personality traits...
form_the_hre_desc: With a realm to rival that of Charlemagne, I could be recognized as his true successor and, invoking Translatio Imperii, have [Root.RelHead.GetBestName] crown me Emperor of a new Roman Empire in the west!
buddhist_DESC: Buddhism was founded by the Buddha, Siddhartha Gautama, in Northeast India in the 5th century BC. The religion flourished in India for more than 1500 years, building huge libraries and monastery complexes, until Muslim invasions and the growing power of the Brahmin caste drove Buddhism out of the subcontinent. In the game, Buddhists get a significant bonus to Learning, meaning that they will research technologies faster.
jain_DESC: Jainism is a religion of incredible antiquity, stemming from the ascetic Sramana tradition of India, in opposition to the priestly Brahmins and the caste system. The guiding principle of Jainism is Ahimsa - non-violence - which is more radically interpreted than in any other religion. In the game, Jains have a hard time waging offensive wars, but their remarkable tolerance means Jain rulers are well liked by all.
alert_adventurer_threat_delayed: The following adventurers are targeting me:\n$LIST$
REVOKE_HONORARY_TITLE_INTERACTION_DESC: Revoke an honorary title previously awarded to a character
REVOKE_HONORARY_TITLE_INTERACTION_LONG_D: You can revoke honorary titles that you have awarded to characters, depriving them of the prestige and income from those titles.
REVOKE_HONORARY_TITLE_INTERACTION_0: Select an honorary title to revoke from §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W.
CANNOT_BUY_RET_TEMP_TITLE: \nYou cannot create this retinue, you hold a temporary title.
CANNOT_PLAY_INDIAN_WITHOUT_DLC: You cannot play an Indian religion without the Rajas of India DLC
CANNOT_PLAY_JUDAISM_WITHOUT_DLC: You cannot play a Jewish character without the Sons of Abraham DLC
DESIGNATE_HEIR_ALLOWED_SUCCESSION: Succession Law must be either Gavelkind, Primogeniture, Ultimogeniture or Open
DESIGNATE_HEIR_ALLOWED_GENDER: Heir Designation must obey the Succession Gender Law
IS_NOT_FORMER_LOVER_OF: Is NOT a Former Lover of §Y$WHO$§!
EVTDESC60400: A brilliant Turkish mercenary and former slave warrior by the name of Sabuktigin has distinguished himself many times, leading his company of horsemen in battle and raids. My commanders think I should give him a more prominent position.
EVTDESC60406: A former Turkish mercenary and slave soldier is on the rise in the land of the Afghans. This Sabuktigin, a zealous man who loathes infidels, seems intent on creating an empire to rival that of the Caliphs of old, as he has just finished crushing [FromFrom.GetTitledName] in a brutal war. Tens of thousands of fierce tribesmen have gathered under his banner!
EVTOPTB60406: What a troubled region that is...
EVTDESC453: I went to [From.GetFirstName]'s chamber and gave [From.GetHerHim] a good tumble!
EVTDESC_RoI_116: The three great branches of Buddhism are Mahayana, Vajrayana and Theravada. You have decided to look for a new philosophy, but which one shall it be?
MORAL_AUTHORITY_DESC: The moral authority of a religion affects the conversion chances of characters and counties and the susceptibility to heresies. A low authority value can prevent the chief pontiff from performing special actions like excommunication. It may also cause instability with various negative events in your realm as the religious institutions lose their grip on the populace.
HIRE_ORDER_DESC: Hire §Y$TITLE$§W for §Y$COST$§W $PIETYNAME$. (They will arrive in or nearby §Y$CAPITAL$§W.)
expel_the_jomsvikings_desc: I can drive the Jomsvikings from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
